subject: Public Speaking
title: Emotional Contagion
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on Emotional Contagion.

hook.text: Emotions spread from speaker to audience like a wave.

buildup.text: Mirror neurons fire when watching someone else feel emotions.

discovery.text: If you feel passionate, they'll feel it. If you're bored, same.

twist.text: Your emotional state is the single biggest factor in engagement.

climax.text: Speakers who genuinely feel their message transmit it.

punchline.text: Feel it genuinely. They'll catch it.

quiz.question: What is emotional contagion?
options: Emotions spreading from speaker to audience
